about_hero_sub: Helping people understand and improve their concentration through brainwave technology
about_overview_text: This project focuses on helping people who have difficulty maintaining concentration, including individuals with ADHD and anyone who wants to improve their focus during daily tasks. By using brainwave (EEG) technology and deep learning, we provide real-time feedback that helps users become more aware of their mental state and improve their productivity.
about_motivation_text: Many students and workers struggle with focus due to stress and distractions. We aim to create an affordable and easy-to-use solution for self-management.
about_technology_text: Our system uses a single-channel EEG sensor and deep learning models such as CNN and LSTM to analyze brainwave signals in real time.
about_vision_text: We envision a future where everyone can understand their mental state and improve learning, focus, and well-being through technology.
